entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 10:35 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:35 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 10:35 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
